segments.text: I notice the boy on the stool, and I can’t help but smile at his determination.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s really going for those cookies, even if it’s risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so hopeful, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely oblivious, just polishing that plate like nothing’s wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is everywhere, and she doesn’t even seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’ll notice before the stool tips over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful compared to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the boy doesn’t fall—he’s really pushing his luck.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how calm the woman is, standing in that puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is both funny and a little terrifying.
segments.speaker: PAR
